inclusion.criterion: Female with pathologically confirmed diagnosis of primary invasive operable breast cancer, stage IIa-IIIc
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate renal and liver function and bone marrow reserve
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Clinical or radiologic evidence of Metastatic disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior or concurrent anti-cancer therapy for current disease
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a postmenopausal woman with HER2-positive and ER/PR-negative breast cancer, stage unknown. She has adequate performance status and renal and liver function.
